text:
using taglibs in tomcat 4 is real slow. the reason i found is that a new 
instance of a taghandler is created everytime a tag is used. 

i think there should be some object-caching (reuse a taghandler after its 
doEndTag-method has been called...) this would improve performance a lot.

greetings,
pero
creator: pero@antaramusic.de

text:
Creating a pool of tag handlers would improve performance with some initial
overhead. This is would be a new feature for the next jasper version.
creator: justyna.horwat@sun.com
remm@apache.org
text:
The main problem which caused taglibs to be slow has been identified. The fixes
are included in Jasper 2, which is included in 4.1.3 Beta. Further performance
improvements will be made (including tag and tag body buffer reuse).

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8290 ***
